name: py-pygobject

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: bindings for the GLib, and GObject, to be used in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: libffi
dependencies.description:
The libffi library provides a portable, high level programming interface
to various calling conventions. This allows a programmer to call any
function specified by a call interface description at run time.

dependencies.name: glib
dependencies.description:
GLib provides the core application building blocks for libraries and
applications written in C. The GLib package contains a low-level
libraries useful for providing data structure handling for C,
portability wrappers and interfaces for such runtime functionality as an
event loop, threads, dynamic loading and an object system.

dependencies.name: py-pycairo
dependencies.description: Pycairo is a set of Python bindings for the cairo graphics library.

dependencies.name: gobject-introspection
dependencies.description:
The GObject Introspection is used to describe the program APIs and
collect them in a uniform, machine readable format.Cairo is a 2D
graphics library with support for multiple output

dependencies.name: gtkplus
dependencies.description:
The GTK+ package contains libraries used for creating graphical user
interfaces for applications.

dependent_to.name: libpeas
dependent_to.description:
libpeas is a gobject-based plugins engine, and is targeted at giving
every application the chance to assume its own extensibility.

dependent_to.name: py-xdot
dependent_to.description:
xdot.py is an interactive viewer for graphs written in Graphviz's dot
language.

dependent_to.name: py-matplotlib
dependent_to.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependent_to.name: gnuradio
dependent_to.description:
GNU Radio is a free & open-source software development toolkit that
provides signal processing blocks to implement software radios. It can
be used with readily-available, low-cost external RF hardware to create
software-defined radios, or without hardware in a simulation-like
environment. It is widely used in hobbyist, academic, and commercial
environments to support both wireless communications research and real-
world radio systems.
